cmd_init_bash_profile:
rm test1.txt
echo -e JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_15 >> test1.txt
echo -e 'PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin' >> test1.txt
echo -e export JAVA_HOME PATH >> test1.txt
echo -e export BOOTH_ID=!@#$ >> test1.txt
echo -e alias ll= \'ls -all\' >> test1.txt
echo -e "export SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE=real" >> test1.txt
cat test1.txt
